description: Manage your Readwise library by searching, retrieving, and organizing highlights, documents, and videos. Create, update, and delete highlights and documents, add notes, tag content, and track reading progress. Accelerate workflows with advanced search, bulk actions, and the ability to save new web content.

debug.description: Enable verbose debug logging to troubleshoot issues

readwiseApiKey.description: Your Readwise API access token. Get it from https://readwise.io/access_token
